text: Can you help me book a hotel room?
Sure, I can help with that. What is the name of the hotel you want to book?
I want to book Marriott Hotel.
Great choice. What is your check-in date and check-out date?
My check-in date is 2022-05-20 and check-out date is 2022-05-22.
Okay, how many rooms do you want to book?
And how many adults and children will be staying in each room?
Two adults in each room and no children.
Okay, I will book two rooms for two adults in Marriott Hotel for 2022-05-20 to 2022-05-22.
Your hotel room is booked. Your order ID is XXXXXXXXX. Can I help with anything else?
